item.title: Update: note1urv:6skyheem
item.description: Hope you all had a good week. One activity that I did was to publish my updates on pubstr, which includes a SOCKS5 proxy option and the generation of NIP-19 entities for events. Yes, it’s the script I mentioned in my previous update: https://github.com/straumer/pubstr
